#Arithmetic Series
```{r}
first = 3

for (i in 1:20) {
  result_a_add = append(result_a_add, first + (i - 1) * 3)
}
result_a_add
```

#Geometric Sequence
```{r}
first = 3
result_a_mul = c()
for (i in 1:20) {
  result_a_mul = append(result_a_mul, first * 2 ** (i - 1))
}
#result_a_mul
sum(result_a_mul)
```

#Sine Approximation
```{r}
my_sin <- function(x, n) {
  result = 0
  for (i in 1:n) {
    result = result + (-1) **((n + 1) / 2) * x ** n / factorial(n)
  }
  return(result)
}

my_sin(pi, 5) - sin(pi)
my_sin(pi, 10) - sin(pi)
my_sin(pi, 50) - sin(pi)
my_sin(pi, 100) - sin(pi)
```
